item.title: Mophie Launches Max Charging Stand for Charging Multiple AirPods
item.description: Mophie today announced the launch of the Max Charging Stand, a two-in-one charger that’s designed for the USB-C AirPods Max and the AirPods or AirPods Pro. The Max Charging Stand holds the ‌AirPo
